00225 template <class U> inline
00226 bool arraycopy(const Array<U>& src, size_t srcPos, Array<U>& dst,
00227             size_t dstPos, size_t length) {
00228     return ArrayImpl::arraycopy(src, srcPos, dst, dstPos, length);

00233 template<class TYPE> inline
00234 Array<TYPE>::Array() {

00236 
00237 template<class TYPE> inline
00238 Array<TYPE>::Array(size_t leng)
00239     : ArrayImpl(sizeof(TYPE),
00240             ((traits<TYPE>::has_trivial_ctor   ? HAS_TRIVIAL_CTOR   : 0)
00241             |(traits<TYPE>::has_trivial_dtor   ? HAS_TRIVIAL_DTOR   : 0)
00242             |(traits<TYPE>::has_trivial_copy   ? HAS_TRIVIAL_COPY   : 0)),
00243             leng) {
00244 }
00245 
00246 #ifdef __GXX_EXPERIMENTAL_CXX0X__
00247 template<class TYPE> inline
00248 Array<TYPE>::Array(std::initializer_list<TYPE> init_list)
00249     : ArrayImpl(sizeof(TYPE),
00250             ((traits<TYPE>::has_trivial_ctor   ? HAS_TRIVIAL_CTOR   : 0)
00251             |(traits<TYPE>::has_trivial_dtor   ? HAS_TRIVIAL_DTOR   : 0)
00252             |(traits<TYPE>::has_trivial_copy   ? HAS_TRIVIAL_COPY   : 0)),
00253             init_list.size()) {
00254     size_t i = 0;
00255     for (const TYPE* p = init_list.begin(); p != init_list.end(); p++)
00256         this->operator[](i++) = *p;
00257 }
00258 #endif  // C++0x

00298     return *(static_cast<const TYPE *>(itemLocation(index)));

00306 template<class TYPE> inline
00307 Array<TYPE> Array<TYPE>::clone() const {
00308     Array<TYPE> cloneArray(this->length());
00309     arraycopy(*this, 0, cloneArray, 0, this->length());
00310     return cloneArray;
00311 }

00325 template<class TYPE>
00326 void Array<TYPE>::do_copy(void* dest, const void* from, size_t num) const {
00327     copy_type(reinterpret_cast<TYPE*>(dest),
00328         reinterpret_cast<const TYPE*>(from), num);
